Item.name: Extended Exploding Ammunition Box
Item.aliases: Extended Exploding Ammunition,Extended Explosive Ammunition Box,Extended Explosive Ammunition

Item.name: Heavy Ammunition Box
Item.description: Ammunition for the coilgun. Heavy composite shells with immense stopping power against soft and hard targets alike.

Item.name: Hybrid Ammunition Box
Item.description: Ammunition for the coilgun. Heavy caliber conversion, hybrid coilgun shells with greatly improved stopping power.

Item.name: Hybrid Flak Ammunition Box
Item.description: Ammunition for the coilgun. Heavy caliber conversion, hybrid coilgun shells equipped with flak warheads.

Item.name: Hybrid Piercing Ammunition Box
Item.description: Ammunition for the coilgun. Heavy caliber conversion, hybrid coilgun shells with armor piercing core.

Item.name: Coilgun Laser Emitter
Item.description: Experimental coilgun hardware conversion. Large laser array which draws directly from a coalition standard coilgun power supply.

Item.name: Hybrid Toxin Ammunition Box
Item.description: Ammunition for the coilgun. Heavy caliber conversion, hybrid coilgun shells with greatly improved stopping power.

Item.name: Hybrid Flare Ammunition Box
Item.description: A flare projection solution in coilgun form. When fired, it creates a bright flare for spotting enemies.

Item.name: High-Velocity Ammunition Box
Item.description: Ammunition for the coilgun. High-velocity composite shells.
